text: Ivan Inzoudine (born 10 December 1996) is a French footballer who plays as a left back for Italian Serie D club S.S.D. Marsala Calcio. ==Club career== ===RC Lens=== Inzoudine is a product of AF Bobigny and later joined RC Lens as a U14 player.Académie de football de Bobigny : Mettez la main au panier !, kiwimag.fr, 7 December 2015Joueur - YVAN INZOUDINE - club Football RC LENS - Footeo, rclens5962.footeo.com He made his debut for the club's B-team in the Championnat National 2 in August 2014 and played a total of 29 games for the team. However, after struggling to get through to the first team, he left the club in the summer 2016. ===EA Guingamp=== After a successful trial, including a friendly game against Brest, Inzoudine joined EA Guingamp on 17 July 2016, where he was registered for the club's B-team.Formé au RC Lens, Ivan Inzoudine rejoint Guingamp, lensois.com, 17 July 2016 Inzoudine was a regular starter for the club's B-team in the Championnat National 3, which also earned him a spot on the bench for two first team games: The first one in Coupe de France on 1 March 2017 and the second one two days later in Ligue 1. However, he never made his first team debut before leaving the club at the end of the season. ===Messina=== Inzoudine moved to Italy and joined Serie D club A.C.R. Messina in January 2018.Messina: ingaggiato il difensore Yvan Inzoudine, strettoweb.com, 18 January 2018 He made 9 appearances in Serie D for the club. ===Cavese=== In the summer 2018, Inzoudine moved to Serie C club Cavese 1919 with his manager from Messina, Giacomo Modica, who had been appointed new manager of Cavese.Cavese, le prime ufficializzazioni: tre conferme e tanti volti nuovi, ilmattino.it, 12 August 2018 He made 15 appearances for Cavese, 13 of them in the Serie C, before the club announced on 31 January 2019, that his contract had been terminated by mutual consent.Calciomercato Cavese, Inzoudine rescinde, corrieredellosport.it, 1 February 2019 ===Marsala=== Left without club since January 2019, Inzoudine joined Serie D club Marsala on 17 December 2019.Calciomercato, colpo Marsala: ufficiale l’arrivo di Inzoudine, stadionews.it, Calciomercato, colpo Marsala: ufficiale l’arrivo di Inzoudine], stadionews.it, 17 December 2019 ==References== ==External links== * * Category:Living people Category:1996 births Category:Association football fullbacks Category:French footballers Category:French expatriate footballers Category:Championnat National 2 players Category:Championnat National 3 players Category:Serie C players Category:Serie D players Category:RC Lens players Category:En Avant de Guingamp players Category:A.C.R. title: Ivan Inzoudine
